alert.note: Alert for Northern Baltimore; Northwest Harford (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 7:02PM EST until January 06 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of a coating to 3 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Northern Baltimore and Northwest Harford Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation is expected to begin as snow and sleet between 7 AM and 10 AM. Precipitation will mix with and change to sleet and freezing rain between 11 AM and 2 PM, then end during the evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
